attributes.action: Stop MP's voting for their own allowances/expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's obvious that If someone puts forward an idea to put a stop to mp's allowances such as second homes when they dont need them but then get the very mp's to vote on it then you know what the out come will be.. mp's claim for literally everything when in fact they earn £65000 a year and have other incomes. so why should they then be able to claim for expenses. live with in your means like everyone else has to. there should be an independent board or enquiry into this to determine how this should be resolved but dont let the very people it affects vote on it

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
